Package reactor.rx

Streams are reactive components that provide a composition API for reacting to Signal rather than by using Selectors and Reactors directly.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Controls
    An interface generally associated with a Stream terminal action such as Stream.consume(reactor.fn.Consumer)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BiStreams
    A Streams add-on to work with key/value pairs hydrated in Tuple2.
    Promise<O>
    A Promise is a stateful event container that accepts a single value or error.
    Promises
    Helper methods for creating Promise instances.
    Signal<T>
    A domain representation of a Reactive Stream signal.
    Stream<O>
    Base class for components designed to provide a succinct API for working with future values.
    Streams
    A public factory to build Stream.
    StreamUtils
    A simple collection of utils to assist in various tasks such as Debugging
    StreamUtils.StreamVisitor  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Promise.FinalState  
    Signal.Type  

Package reactor.rx Description

Streams are reactive components that provide a composition API for reacting to Signal rather than by using Selectors and Reactors directly.
